Time_Crawl.help: You're able to dramatically slow the time around a single enemy, reducing their movement speed and attack rate. Time is slowed to such an extreme that their wounds will take longer to heal, reducing their regeneration rate. Time Crawl applies the Delayed effect on its target. Debuff and control effects from other Time Manipulation powers are increased on targets affected by Delayed. Recharge: Long.
Time_Crawl.targetHelp: Your attack rate, movement speed and regeneration rate have been reduced.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} slows you significantly with their {PowerName}, reducing your movement speed, attack speed and regeneration speed.

Temporal_Mending.help: You mend the wounds of yourself and nearby allies by placing your bodies in a past or future state where they are far less injured. Temporal Mending will immediately heal its targets and continue to heal them for an equal amount over the next 6 seconds. Additionally, affected allies will gain some resistance to slow effects and regeneration debuffs. Allies affected by the Accelerated effect will receive additional healing from this power. Temporal Mending will apply a regeneration bonus instead of heal over time for a short while if the user is in a PvP zone. Recharge: Long
Temporal_Mending.shortHelp: PBAoE, Heal (Self and Allies), HoT (Self and Allies), +RES(Slow, Regen Debuff)

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} continually heals you for {Damage} health with {PowerName}.

Time_Stop.help: You trap your target within the flow of time causing them to be held helpless. Even those resistant to the effects of Time Stop's hold will still have their regeneration rate and healing effects reduced for a brief period.
Time_Stop.targetHelp: You have been held. Your healing effects and regeneration rate have also been reduced.

Slowed_Response.help: You manipulate time around a targeted foe causing their reflexes to become slowed and sluggish. This causes them to have decreased defense and damage resistance.
Slowed_Response.targetHelp: Your defenses and resistances have been reduced.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} debilitates you, causing a {PowerName} which reduces your defenses and resistance to all forms of damage.

Lightning_Bolt.help: You strike your target with a powerful lightning bolt from the sky, dealing energy damage and draining some Endurance. Some of this Endurance may transfer back to you.
Lightning_Bolt.targetHelp: Your recovery has been reduced and your endurance is being drained.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

Shuriken.help: You throw a shuriken at your target, causing lethal damage. The target also develops a bleeding wound, which causes additional damage over time.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.

Quick_Strike.help: A quick attack that deals smashing and energy damage. This attack also has a chance to knock the target down.
Quick_Strike.shortHelp: Melee, Light DMG(Smashing/Energy), -DMG(Foe, All), Chance for Knockdown(Foe)

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Repulsing_Torrent.help: This attack unleashes a powerful cone of energy that can smash foes. It has a high chance of knocking them back.
Repulsing_Torrent.shortHelp: Ranged (Cone), Moderate DMG(Smashing/Energy), Chance for Knockback(Foe)

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!
